params._burnableZORRewards: Quantity of ZOR tokens minted for rewards here that need to be burned on the home chain
params._gasForDestinationLZReceive: How much additional gas to provide at destination contract
params._originChainId: Zorro chain ID of chain to which funds are to be repatriated to
params._originRecipient: Recipient of funds on the origin chain
params._rewardsDue: ZOR rewards due to the recipient
params._trancheId: ID of tranche on current chain that funds were withdrawn from

returns._0: uint256 Estimated fee in native tokens

params._gasForDestinationLZReceive: How much additional gas to provide at destination contract
params._maxMarketMovement: Acceptable degree of slippage on any transaction (e.g. 950 = 5%, 990 = 1% etc.)
params._pid: The pool ID on the remote chain
params._trancheId: The tranche ID on the remote chain
params._zorroChainId: The Zorro Chain ID (not the LayerZero one)

returns._0: uint256 Expected fee to pay for bridging/cross chain execution

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

receiveXChainRepatriationRequest(uint256.details: Should never ever be actually called.

receiveXChainWithdrawalRequest(uint256,b.details: Should never ever be actually called.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

sendXChainWithdrawalRequest(uint256,uint.details: Requires value to be submitted to pay for cross chain transaction. Use checkXChainWithdrawalFee() to estimate fees

params._destZorroChainId: The Zorro chain ID of the remote chain to withdraw from
params._gasForDestinationLZReceive: How much additional gas to provide at destination contract
params._maxMarketMovement: Acceptable degree of slippage on any transaction (e.g. 950 = 5%, 990 = 1% etc.)
params._pid: The pool ID on the remote chain
params._trancheId: The ID of the tranche for the given user and pool

params._controller: Bytes representation of smart contract address for cross chain contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

checkXChainWithdrawalFee(uint256,uint256.notice: Checks to see how much a cross chain withdrawal will cost

receiveXChainRepatriationRequest(uint256.notice: Dummy func to allow .selector call above and guarantee typesafety for abi calls.

receiveXChainWithdrawalRequest(uint256,b.notice: Dummy func to allow .selector call above and guarantee typesafety for abi calls.

sendXChainWithdrawalRequest(uint256,uint.notice: Prepares and sends a cross chain withdrwal request.

setControllerContract(uint256,bytes).notice: Setter: Controller contract for each chain

setStargateDestPoolIds(uint256,uint16).notice: Setter: Stargate dest pool IDs for USD asset
